name: Headman
description:
A surreal avant-garde platformer. Developed within the course of a year. Playtime lasts about two hours for full completion.

Uses Cave Story as a base. No assets from Cave Story are used in-game.

Credits:

Rhombidandy - Headconfig Fix
Brayconn - Omega XML, TSC help, and Beta Testing

And of course, Studio Pixel, for creating Cave Story.
